description:
This market refers to the LoL match between Weibo Gaming and Bilibili Gaming in the LPL Group Ascend, scheduled for January 15 at 6:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Weibo Gaming" if Weibo Gaming secures the most towers across all games in the match. 

This market will resolve to "Bilibili Gaming" if Bilibili Gaming secures the most towers across all games in the match.

If both teams secure the same number of towers across all games in the match, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market will resolve to "Weibo Gaming" if Weibo Gaming win against Bilibili Gaming in the named LoL match in the LPL Split 1 Group Ascend, scheduled for January 15 at 6:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Bilibili Gaming" if Bilibili Gaming win against Weibo Gaming in the LoL match.

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.

If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/leagueoflegends/Main_Page.
events.title: LoL: Weibo Gaming vs Bilibili Gaming (BO3)

question: Series: Most towers?
